purpose: To highlight the main driver for score improvement in 2020.
title: 2020 score improvement main driver was new targets
reasoning_strategy: Emphasize the impact of new targets on sustainability scores.

chart.title: Average score Î” 2020-2019

annotations.label: ~50% operators introduced new targets for emission reduction (primarily scope 1 & 2) or for waste reduction
CDP rating decreased/increased for ~25% of telcos each. Detailing of env. data and external assurance has improved for some telcos
Integration of sustainability in supplier selection improved for ~30% of telcos
Waste over IP traffic indicator increased for 65% of telcos, while waste over customers only for 35%. Mobile phone collection indicator decreased for 30% of telcos, improved only for 20%
Energy use/emissions over IP traffic criteria has improved for 80% of telcos due to increasing traffic, while emissions/energy over customers only improved for 30-60%
Green initiatives & R&D expenditure improved for ~25% of telcos, 10% of telcos improved cust. enablement reporting

chart.source: BCG Sustainability in Telco Index 2020, N=22
